LocalizedTexts.AltID: This is a hand-tracking and controller experience
LocalizedTexts.Value: This is a hand-tracking and controller experience

LocalizedTexts.AltID: High contrast between hands and background
LocalizedTexts.Value: High contrast between hands and background

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Option for playing the experience sitting down
LocalizedTexts.Value: Option for playing the experience sitting down

LocalizedTexts.AltID: This won't appear again until the save data is cleared
LocalizedTexts.Value: This won't appear again until the save data has been cleared

LocalizedTexts.AltID: This experience is enhanced with Scene Understanding. During room setup controllers may be required.
LocalizedTexts.Value: This experience is enhanced with scene understanding. During room setup, controllers may be required

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Hold your hand sideways and prepare to pinch
LocalizedTexts.Value: Hold your hand sideways and prepare to pinch

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Move the controller to the adapter connection port
LocalizedTexts.Value: Move the controller to the adapter connection port

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Hold the grip trigger to affix the adapter
LocalizedTexts.Value: Hold the grip trigger to affix the adapter

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Aim at an object after installing the adapter
LocalizedTexts.Value: Aim at an object after installing the adapter

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Hold the index finger trigger to select
LocalizedTexts.Value: Hold the index finger trigger to select

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Put your hand into the portal and take out the object
LocalizedTexts.Value: Put your hand into the portal and take out the object

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Speak the commands you need the drone to do
LocalizedTexts.Value: Speak the commands you need the drone to do

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The Drone will recieve your commands and take action
LocalizedTexts.Value: The drone will receive your commands and take action

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Open your hand and aim at an object
LocalizedTexts.Value: Open your hand and aim at an object

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Close your hand to grab the object remotely
LocalizedTexts.Value: Close your hand to grab the object remotely

LocalizedTexts.AltID: If there's no internet connection, you won't be able to use the voice SDK, meaning you'll have to use buttons instead.
LocalizedTexts.Value: If there's no Internet connection, you won't be able to use the voice SDK, meaning that you'll have to use buttons instead

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Voice commands are not available right now
LocalizedTexts.Value: Voice commands are not available at the moment

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Voice commands are not available without internet
LocalizedTexts.Value: Voice commands are not available without Internet

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Voice commands are not available without microphone permissions
LocalizedTexts.Value: Voice commands are not available without microphone permissions

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Buttons can be used even when voice commands are not available
LocalizedTexts.Value: Buttons can be used even when voice commands are not available

LocalizedTexts.AltID: This experience is best with controllers, please pick up your controllers now to continue
LocalizedTexts.Value: This experience is best with controllers – please pick up your controllers now to continue

LocalizedTexts.AltID: No thanks, I like hand tracking
LocalizedTexts.Value: No thanks – I like hand tracking

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Although this is a controllers experience
LocalizedTexts.Value: Although this is a controllers experience

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use hand tracking for the best experience
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use hand tracking for the best experience

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use controllers for the best experience
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use controllers for the best experience

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Experience more great content on the Meta Quest Store
LocalizedTexts.Value: Experience more great content on the Meta Quest Store

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to turn. Hold your hand sideways and do the point gesture.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to turn. Hold your hand sideways and do the point gesture

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to teleport. Point towards a direction and pinch to select.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to teleport. Point towards a direction and pinch to select

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to teleport. Extend your index finger and curl the others, then pinch.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to teleport. Extend your index finger and curl the others, then pinch

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to turn left. Move your hand to the left and pinch to select.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to turn left. Move your hand to the left and pinch to select

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to turn right. Move your hand to the right and pinch to select.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to turn right. Move your hand to the right and pinch to select

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Success! Awesome! You are good to go...
LocalizedTexts.Value: Success! Awesome! You are good to go

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Success! Yes! Now one more time!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Success! Yes. Now one more time!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Success! Awesome! Let's give it a twist.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Success! Awesome! Let's give it a twist

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Success! Great! Let's turn to the left!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Success! Great! Let's turn to the left!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Success! Great! Let's turn to the right!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Success! Great! Let's turn to the right!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to teleport. Move the joystick forward and release to teleport.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to teleport. Move the joystick forward and release to teleport

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to turn left. Move the joystick to the left to turn left.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to turn left. Move the joystick to the left to turn left

LocalizedTexts.AltID: How to turn right. Move the joystick to the right to turn right.
LocalizedTexts.Value: How to turn right. Move the joystick to the right to turn right

LocalizedTexts.AltID: I'll head to the generator, we can work as a team
LocalizedTexts.Value: I'll head to the generator – we can work as a team

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Once both generators are functional, pull the lever and push the button to power up the machinery above
LocalizedTexts.Value: Once both generators are functional, pull the lever and push the button to power up the machinery above

LocalizedTexts.AltID: At generator 2 a fuse needs replacing
LocalizedTexts.Value: At generator 2, a fuse needs replacing

LocalizedTexts.AltID: At generator 1 it looks like somethings obstructing the blades
LocalizedTexts.Value: At generator 1, it looks like somethings obstructing the blades

LocalizedTexts.AltID: To power up the machinery above us we need to get these generators up and running
LocalizedTexts.Value: To power up the machinery above us, we need to get these generators up and running

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Say a command to me and I will respond and act on it
LocalizedTexts.Value: Say a command to me, and I will respond and act on it
